title.narrative: Consultant to support MTR process DRC

description.narrative: Insatsen är ett kortare uppdrag att stödja ambassaden i arbetet med att se över Sveriges strategi för utvecklingssamarbete med DRK i syfte att dels komma med strategiska rekommendationer om strategins genomförande under den resterande perioden, dels genomföra grundanalyser och reflektioner för att underlätta för Utrikesdepartementet vid framtagandet av nästa strategi.

The contribution is a shorter mission to support the embassy in the work of reviewing Sweden's development cooperation strategy with DRC in order to provide strategic recommendations on the implementation of the strategy during the remaining period, and to carry out basic analyzes and reflections to facilitate the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in the development of the next strategy.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: A consultant was contracted to assisting in the mid-term review process of the Swedish development cooperation strategy for DRC 2015-2019. The assignment consisted of producing basic analysis on current work and future posibilities for Swedish development cooperation and providing support to a multidimensional poverty analysis. More specifically the consultant/s helped the Embassy in:a) Undertaking a review of the Swedish cooperation in the DRC since 2010 including humanitarian assistance.b) Compiling information about finalised evaluations (initiated either by Sweden and/or partner evaluations for projects supported).c) Undertaking a review on how mainstreaming issues have evolved and been addressed in the cooperation since 2015: environment/climate; conflict; and gender.d) Producing an analysis on the linkage humanitarian-development (resilience) in the cooperation since 2015.e) Summarizing information regarding largest donors, aid coordination mechanisms and EU joint programming in DRC.f) Undertaking a portfolio analysis/mapping (current and planned portfolio).g) Providing input to a multidimensional poverty analysis and/or analyse and synthesize MPDA similar analysis by other actors/think tanks.h) Assessing Swedish comparative advantages in DRC with focus on development cooperation but also the linkage with humanitarian assistance. Three reports were produced that served as input to the in-depth strategy report submitted to Sida HQ in March 2018, and the multi-dimensional poverty analysis submitted to HQ in May 2018.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
